skills.name: Roaring Thunderclap
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Serval's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Lightning Flash
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> for enemies hit to become Shocked for <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nWhile Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak></color> of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Here Comes the Mechanical Fever
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Serval's ATK to all enemies. Enemies already Shocked will extend the duration of their Shock state by <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

skills.name: Galvanic Chords
skills.desc: After Serval attacks, deals <u>Additional</u> Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Serval's ATK to all Shocked enemies.

skills.name: Good Night, Belobog
skills.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> of Serval's ATK to a random enemy, with a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> <u>base chance</u> for all enemies to become Shocked for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).\nWhile Shocked, enemies will take Lightning DoT equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

eidolons.name: Echo Chamber
eidolons.desc: Basic ATK deals Lightning DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the Basic ATK's DMG to a random enemy adjacent to the target of the Basic ATK.

eidolons.name: Encore!
eidolons.desc: Every time Serval's Talent is triggered to deal Additional DMG, she regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

eidolons.name: Listen, the Heartbeat of the Gears
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Make Some Noise!
eidolons.desc: Ultimate has a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> base chance to apply Shock to any enemies not currently Shocked. This Shock has the same effects as the one applied by Skill.

eidolons.name: Belobog's Loudest Roar!
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: This Song Rocks to Heaven!
eidolons.desc: Serval deals <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> more DMG to Shocked enemies.

skillTree.name: Rock 'n' Roll
skillTree.desc: Skill has a <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> increased base chance to Shock enemies.

skillTree.name: String Vibration
skillTree.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

skillTree.name: Mania
skillTree.desc: Upon defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
